ComicInfo.Summary:
And Now-- Phantom Force: Apocalypse and Probe attempt to recover an antidote for the Black Virus from a lab.
Chapter Two: The Scheme!: Tatsuki gives up on the Phantom Force and plans to hire Gin Seng to recover the antidote.
Chapter Three: Gin Seng, Master of the Martial Arts!: Gin Seng is kidnapped and informed of the task he must complete against his will.
ComicInfo.Writer: Mike Thibodeaux,Richard French,Jack Kirby,Michael Thibodeaux,Richard French
ComicInfo.Title: And Now-- Phantom Force; Chapter Two: The Scheme!; Chapter Three: Gin Seng, Master of the Martial Arts!
